comment: Basically, it's Kwak with Scottish Ale yeast instead of Belgian.  Sort of has a Yuengling flavor profile, but more intense, more malty, drier finish.  I may add more finishing hops, as they are not at all part of of the flavor profile, but that is by design.  I don't want to "Americanize" this one.
I spoke too soon.  It turned out out to be perfect after some aging.  Really wouldn't change a thing.
